TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IPInterfaceProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关支持 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 或 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 的网络接口的信息。

span.span: Provides information about network interfaces that support Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) or Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供对支持 IPv4 或 IPv6 的网络接口的配置和地址信息的访问。This class provides access to configuration and address information for network interfaces that support IPv4 or IPv6. 不创建此类的实例;它们由 方法返回。You do not create instances of this class; they are returned by the method. 若要访问特定于 IPv4 的属性，请使用 方法返回的对象。To access IPv4-specific properties, use the object returned by the method. 若要访问特定于 IPv6 的属性，请使用 方法返回的对象。To access IPv6-specific properties, use the object returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示地址信息。The following code example displays address information. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfoReport#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfoReport#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#8)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能从派生自 的类调用此构造函数。This constructor can be called only from classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property AnycastAddresses As IPAddressInformationCollection

summary.span: 获取分配给此接口的任意广播 IP 地址。

span.span: Gets the anycast IP addresses assigned to this interface.

value.span: ，包含此接口的任意广播地址。

span.span: An that contains the anycast addresses for this interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任意播地址标识多台计算机。An anycast address identifies multiple computers. 发送到任意播地址的数据包将发送到由该地址标识的一台计算机。Packets sent to an anycast address are sent to one of the computers identified by the address. 任意播寻址是一项用于更新一组主机的路由器表的 IPv6 功能。Anycast addressing is an IPv6 feature used to update router tables for a group of hosts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地计算机上的网络接口的任意播地址。The following code example displays the anycast addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#43](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#43)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#43](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#43)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#43)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DhcpServerAddresses As IPAddressCollection

summary.span: 获取此接口的动态主机配置协议 (DHCP) 服务器的地址。

span.span: Gets the addresses of Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) servers for this interface.

value.span: ，它包含 DHCP 服务器的地址信息，如果找不到服务器，则包含空数组。

span.span: An that contains the address information for DHCP servers, or an empty array if no servers are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态主机配置协议（DHCP）允许计算机从 DHCP 服务器获取网络地址，而不是使用静态（固定）网络地址。Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) allows a computer to obtain a network address from a DHCP server, as opposed to using a static (fixed) network address. DHCP 服务器不会永久分配地址;相反，它会将多个可用地址之一暂时用于计算机。A DHCP server does not permanently assign addresses; instead, it temporarily uses one of a number of available addresses to the computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地计算机上的网络接口的 DHCP 地址信息。The following code example displays the DHCP address information for the network interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#46](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#46)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#46](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#46)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#46](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#46)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DnsAddresses As IPAddressCollection

summary.span: 获取此接口的域名系统 (DNS) 服务器的地址。

span.span: Gets the addresses of Domain Name System (DNS) servers for this interface.

value.span: 一个包含 DNS 服务器地址的 。

span.span: A that contains the DNS server addresses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DNS 是一种分层命名系统，用于将主机名映射到 IP 地址。DNS is a hierarchical naming system used to map host names to IP addresses. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地计算机上的网络接口的 DNS 地址。The following code example displays the DNS addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#42](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#42)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#42)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DnsSuffix As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ DnsSuffix { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与此接口关联的域名系统 (DNS) 后缀。

span.span: Gets the Domain Name System (DNS) suffix associated with this interface.

value.span: 包含此接口的 DNS 后缀的 ，如果此接口没有 DNS 后缀，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the DNS suffix for this interface, or if there is no DNS suffix for the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DNS 后缀标识域名（例如 "contoso.com"），该域名会附加到未限定的主机名，以获取适合 DNS 名称查询的完全限定的域名（FQDN）。The DNS suffix identifies the domain name (for example, "contoso.com") that is appended to an unqualified host name to obtain a fully qualified domain name (FQDN) suitable for a DNS name query. 例如，如果本地计算机的 是 "contoso.com"，并且必须解析不合格的主机名 "www"，则要查询的 FQDN 为 "www.contoso.com"。For example, if the local machine has "contoso.com" as its , and must resolve the unqualified host name "www", the FQDN to query is "www.contoso.com". ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 DNS 后缀。The following code example displays the DNS suffix. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#41)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#41)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property GatewayAddresses As GatewayIPAddressInformationCollection

summary.span: 获取此接口的 IPv4 网关地址。

span.span: Gets the IPv4 network gateway addresses for this interface.

value.span: ，它包含网关的地址信息，如果找不到网关，则包含空数组。

span.span: An that contains the address information for network gateways, or an empty array if no gateways are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回实现 Internet 协议版本4（IPv4）以在网络之间转发数据包的网关。Gateways that implement the Internet Protocol Version 4 (IPv4) to forward packets between networks are returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地计算机上的网络接口的网关地址。The following code example displays the gateway addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#47](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#47)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#47](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#47)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#47)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties GetIPv4Properties() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetIPv4Properties () As IPv4InterfaceProperties

summary.span: 提供此网络接口的 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 配置数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) configuration data for this network interface.

returns.span: 包含 IPv4 配置数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains IPv4 configuration data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关对支持 IPv4 的接口可用信息的详细说明，请参阅 类文档。For a detailed description of the information available for an interface that supports IPv4, see the class documentation. 请注意， 方法返回的对象反映了创建对象时的配置。Note that the object returned by the method reflects the configuration as of the time the object is created. 此信息不会动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically.

exception.span: 此接口不支持 IPv4 协议。

span.span: The interface does not support the IPv4 protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv6InterfaceProperties GetIPv6Properties() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetIPv6Properties () As IPv6InterfaceProperties

summary.span: 提供此网络接口的 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 配置数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) configuration data for this network interface.

returns.span: 包含 IPv6 配置数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains IPv6 configuration data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关可用于支持 IPv6 的接口的信息的详细说明，请参阅 文档。For a detailed description of the information available for an interface that supports IPv6, see the documentation. 请注意， 方法返回的对象反映了创建对象时的配置。Note that the object returned by the method reflects the configuration as of the time the object is created. 此信息不会动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically.

exception.span: 此接口不支持 IPv6 协议。

span.span: The interface does not support the IPv6 protocol.

value.span: 如果将 NetBt 配置为对此接口使用 DNS 名称解析，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if NetBt is configured to use DNS name resolution on this interface; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks DNS 是一种分层命名系统，用于将主机名映射到 IP 地址。DNS is a hierarchical naming system used to map host names to IP addresses. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsDynamicDnsEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsDynamicDnsEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取 值，该值指示此接口是否配置为自动向域名系统 (DNS) 注册其 IP 地址信息。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface is configured to automatically register its IP address information with the Domain Name System (DNS).

value.span: 如果此接口被配置为自动注册其动态 IP 地址与静态域名之间的映射，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this interface is configured to automatically register a mapping between its dynamic IP address and static domain names; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态 DNS 使客户端能够通知 DNS 服务器其动态 IP 地址已映射到其静态主机名。Dynamic DNS enables a client to inform the DNS servers that its dynamic IP address is mapped to its static host name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#41)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#41)]

summary.span: 获取分配给此接口的多播地址。

span.span: Gets the multicast addresses assigned to this interface.

value.span: 包含此接口的多路广播地址的 。

span.span: An that contains the multicast addresses for this interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多播地址标识多台计算机。A multicast address identifies multiple computers. 发送到多播地址的数据包将发送到由该地址标识的所有计算机。Packets sent to a multicast address are sent to all computers identified by the address. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地计算机上的网络接口的多播地址。The following code example displays the multicast addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer. summary.span: 获取分配给此接口的单播地址。

span.span: Gets the unicast addresses assigned to this interface.
An that contains the unicast addresses for this interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单播地址标识一台计算机。A unicast address identifies a single computer. 发送到单播地址的数据包将发送到由该地址标识的计算机。Packets sent to a unicast address are sent to the computer identified by the address. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地计算机上的网络接口的单播地址。The following code example displays the unicast addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property WinsServersAddresses As IPAddressCollection

summary.span: 获取 Windows Internet 名称服务 (WINS) 服务器的地址。

span.span: Gets the addresses of Windows Internet Name Service (WINS) servers.

value.span: ，它包含 WINS 服务器的地址信息，如果找不到服务器，则包含空数组。

span.span: An that contains the address information for WINS servers, or an empty array if no servers are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WINS 提供了一个分布式数据库，用于向 IP 地址映射注册和查询动态 NetBIOS 名称。WINS provides a distributed database for registering and querying dynamic NetBIOS names to IP address mappings.
